item.title: Christopher Nolan’s ‘The Odyssey’: Tickets for Imax 70MM Screenings Now Officially on Sale a Year Out
item.description: The unprecedented offer commenced Thursday at midnight EDT for theater auditoriums equipped with the director’s format of choice.
